select USER_ID, USER_NAME, NICKNAME, USER_FOREIGN_NAME, SEX, BIRTHDAY, PHONE_NO, EMAIL, ADDRESS, AVATAR, USER_STATUS, REMARK, DON_USER_INFO_ID from don_user_info a where 1=1
and (USER_NAME = #{queryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or NICKNAME= #{queryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} or EMAIL= #{queryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
